name: EXELON CORP
footnote: Exelons consolidated assets include $9,565 million and $8,893 million at December 31, 2017 and December 31, 2016, respectively, of certain VIEs that can only be used to settle the liabilities of the VIE. Exelons consolidated liabilities include $3,612 million and $3,356 million at December 31, 2017 and December 31, 2016, respectively, of certain VIEs for which the VIE creditors do not have recourse to Exelon. See Note 2Variable Interest Entities.
